sn33.1:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
sn33.1:1.2: Atha kho vacchagotto paribbajako yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavata saddhim sammodi.
sn33.1:1.3: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho vacchagotto paribbajako bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn33.1:1.4: “ko nu kho, bho gotama, hetu, ko paccayo, yanimani anekavihitani ditthigatani loke uppajjanti—
sn33.1:1.5: sassato lokoti va, asassato lokoti va, antava lokoti va, anantava lokoti va, tam jivam tam sariranti va, annam jivam annam sariranti va, hoti tathagato param maranati va, na hoti tathagato param maranati va, hoti ca na ca hoti tathagato param maranati va, neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param maranati va”ti?
sn33.1:1.6: “Rupe kho, vaccha, annana, rupasamudaye annana, rupanirodhe annana, rupanirodhagaminiya patipadaya annana;
sn33.1:1.9: neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param maranati vati.
sn33.1:1.10: Ayam kho, vaccha, hetu, ayam paccayo, yanimani anekavihitani ditthigatani loke uppajjanti—
sn33.1:1.11: sassato lokoti va, asassato lokoti va …pe…
sn33.1:1.12: neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param maranati va”ti.
